[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Function(
        Function {
            comments: CommentGroup {
                comments: [],
            },
            attributes: [],
            function: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 1,
                position: 7,
            },
            ampersand: None,
            name: SimpleIdentifier {
                span: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 10,
                    position: 16,
                },
                value: "foo",
            },
            parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [],
                },
                left_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 13,
                    position: 19,
                },
                parameters: CommaSeparated {
                    inner: [],
                    commas: [],
                },
                right_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 24,
                    position: 30,
                },
            },
            return_type: None,
            body: FunctionBody {
                comments: CommentGroup {
                    comments: [
                        Comment {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 3,
                                column: 14,
                                position: 20,
                            },
                            format: MultiLine,
                            content: "/* $bar */",
                        },
                    ],
                },
                left_brace: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 26,
                    position: 32,
                },
                statements: [],
                right_brace: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 27,
                    position: 33,
                },
            },
        },
    ),
]
